Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for user lists and the sorting for them as well. Date: 4/20/2022
Author:
Dalton Stenzel

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Method that collects a list of all users in the database from an instance of a userRepository.
      Returns:
      list of users .

    • getByKeyword

      public List<User> getByKeyword(String keyword)
      Method that collects a list of all users that contain particular keyword provided by the user.
      Parameters:
      keyword - is a set characters provided by a user.
      Returns:
      list of users that contains the keyword provided by a user.

    • getBySetCount

      public List<User> getBySetCount(List<User> list, int start, int end)
      Method that chops up given list into a smaller list from a certain range provided for admin user table pages.
      Parameters:
      list - is the list referenced when making a smaller list.
      start - is the value used as the beginning of the range.
      end - is the value used as the ending of the range.
      Returns:
      another list made from the given list and start/end range values.

    • sorting

      public List<User> sorting(List<User> list, String type, Integer sortOr)
      Method that sorts a given list with the given type of sort and sort order.
      Parameters:
      list - is the list of users that is provided to be arranged.
      type - is the type of sort type: firstName, lastName, id, email, and role.
      sortOr - is the order in which the sorted list is provided: ascending(1) and descending(0).
      Returns:
      list that is either sorted in a particular fashion and order or uses the getAllUsers method if a provided sort parameter is unknown.
